The rest is sefl-explanatory.

item.title: ----delta----How do i make Combat exp harder 317
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

rang3i lyf3:

my players quit wen there lvls are all up and i need to make exp harder

… Please be more specific about your deob and base.

I’m just going to jump into it, and suggest you have Project Insanity.

Search for Config.Java > Use Ctrl + F > And search for Melee

And change the three digits, to whatever. If it’s high, you need to make it lower in digits to make it harder.

Read full topic
